t: Can Amazon finally crack luxury with Saks? | Vogue Business
s: April 30, 2025 - A variety of fashion, makeup and skincare brands are listed in the storefront, which is part of Amazon Luxury Stores, including Stella McCartney, Balmain, Dolce & Gabbana, Fear of God, Adam Lippes, Giambattista Valli and Rebecca Vallance, most with a limited selection available to shop.
